titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1058) to reform Federal securities litigation, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-382, by Mr. Dreier.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1058. Waiving all points of ordder against the conference report and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 143.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 318 - 97, 1 Present (Roll no. 838).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/5/1995--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1058 (securities litigation).
